title.value: Quiz: Safe Atmosphere and Gas Freeing Procedures

questions.question: What is the acceptable maximum concentration of Carbon Monoxide (CO) in an enclosed space for safe entry?
Carbon monoxide tends to accumulate at the top of an enclosed space because it is lighter than air.
What equipment did the Chief Officer use on the day of the incident to check the atmosphere in the cargo tanks?

options.value: A) Eagle 2 Model with a long hose
B) Eagle 2 Red with a short hose

questions.question: The gas freeing procedure was completed for 7 hours in the 2 Starboard cargo oil tank before the entry was made.
